      • fromItemData

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack fromItemData(ItemData info,
                                                          org.bukkit.Material... forcedMaterial)
        Creates an ItemStack from the given ItemData.
        Parameters:
        info - The ItemData containing information about the item.
        forcedMaterial - Optional forced Material to use. If provided, this Material will be used regardless of the material specified in the ItemData.
        Returns:
        The created ItemStack with the specified properties.
